remarks: Commutation of restricted and unrestricted existential quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)
statement:
ralcom4f.1 $e |- F/_ y A $.
rexcom4f $p |- ( E. x e. A E. y ph <-> E. y E. x e. A ph ) $.
$d x y $.
